alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Washington (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 7:39AM EST until February 21 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Ohio... Muskingum River At McConnelsville affecting Washington and Morgan Counties. For the Muskingum River...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Muskingum River At McConnelsville. * WHEN...Until Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Route 669 above Malta and other roads are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM EST Saturday the stage was 11.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 AM EST Saturday was 11.5 feet. - Forecast...The river will remain around flood stage through the weekend. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.2 feet on 02/13/1966. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rlx. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 100 PM EST.
